scripts.import-generics: npm run import-users && npm run import-continents && npm run import-countries && npm run import-cities
scripts.import-items: npm run import-companies && npm run import-genres && npm run import-genders && npm run import-professions && npm run import-movies && npm run import-persons
scripts.export-generics: npm run export-users && npm run export-continents && npm run export-countries && npm run export-cities
scripts.export-items: npm run export-companies && npm run export-genres && npm run export-genders && npm run export-professions && npm run export-movies && npm run export-persons
scripts.import: npm run import-generics && npm run import-items
scripts.export: npm run export-generics && npm run export-items
scripts.import-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run import-generics && npm run import-items
scripts.export-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run export-generics && npm run export-items
scripts.database: npm run create-database && npm run create-domains && npm run create-tables
scripts.create: npm run database && npm run import
scripts.create-prod: npm run database && npm run import-prod
